question.title: Parser for OpenCSV's CsvToBeanBuilder
question.body:
I have some backslashes in my csv file data. How do you set a parser (such as rfc4180Parser) in OpenCSV's CsvToBeanBuilder?

RFC4180Parser rfc4180Parser = new RFC4180ParserBuilder().build();

List<MyObjVO> beans = new CsvToBeanBuilder(new InputStreamReader(inInputStream))
        .withType(MyObjVO.class)
        .build()
        .parse();
